row.post_process:
:SET &checkForText# = "Websphere:*" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.RETRIEVE_LINE_BY_TEXT :PRINT "&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#" :IF STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#) > 12 : SET &UC4RB_RESULT_SNAP_XML# = SUBSTR(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#,12) : DEFINE &host_port#, string, 2 : FILL &host_port#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_RESULT_SNAP_XML#,"::") : PSET &UC4RB_WAS_HOST# = STR_TRIM(&host_port#[1]) : PSET &UC4RB_WAS_PORT# = STR_TRIM(&host_port#[2])
:ENDIF
:SET &checkForText# = "SnapMode:*" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.RETRIEVE_LINE_BY_TEXT :PRINT "&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#" :IF STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#) > 11 : PSET &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_MODE# = SUBSTR(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#,11) :ENDIF
:SET &checkForText# = "AppName:*" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.RETRIEVE_LINE_BY_TEXT :PRINT "&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#" :IF STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#) > 10 : PSET &UC4RB_APP_NAME# = SUBSTR(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#,10) :ENDIF
